title: Orthanc API Client — Orthanc
text: List changes Whenever Orthanc receives new DICOM instance, event recorded -called Changes Log. enables remote scripts react arrival new DICOM resources. typical application auto-routing, external script waits new DICOM instance arrive Orthanc, forward instance another modality. Please note , resources deleted, corresponding change entries also removed Changes Log, helps ensuring log grow indefinitely.

Multiple values can provided must separated ';'.

title: Orthanc API Client — Orthanc
text: Optional query parameters (params): expand (string): present, retrieve detailed information individual resources, Orthanc identifiers full (boolean): present, report DICOM tags full format (tags indexed hexadecimal format, associated symbolic name value) limit (number): Limit number results requested-tags (string): present, list DICOM Tags want list response. argument semi-column separated list DICOM Tags identifiers; e.g: 'requested-tags=0010,0010;PatientBirthDate'. tags requested tags returned 'RequestedTags' field response. Note , requesting tags listed Main Dicom Tags stored DB, building response might slow since Orthanc need access DICOM files. specified, Orthanc return Main Dicom Tags keep backward compatibility Orthanc prior 1.11.0. response-content (string): Defines content response returned resource. Force (logical): Allow modification tags related DICOM identifiers, risk breaking DICOM model real world Keep (list): List DICOM tags whose value must destroyed anonymization. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). KeepLabels (logical): Keep labels resources level (defaults FALSE) KeepPrivateTags (logical): Keep private tags DICOM instances (defaults FALSE) KeepSource (logical): set FALSE, instructs Orthanc remove original resources. default, original resources kept Orthanc. LossyQuality (numeric): transcoding lossy transfer syntax, entry defines quality integer 1 100. provided, value defined "DicomLossyTranscodingQuality" configuration. (new v1.12.7) PrivateCreator (character): private creator used private tags Replace Remove (list): List additional tags removed DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). Replace (list): Associative array change value DICOM tags DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). (new v1.12.7) PrivateCreator (character): private creator used private tags Replace Remove (list): List tags must removed DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). RemovePrivateTags (logical): Remove private tags DICOM instances (defaults FALSE) Replace (list): Associative array change value DICOM tags DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). Transcode (character): Transcode DICOM instances provided DICOM transfer syntax: https://orthanc.uclouvain./book/faq/transcoding.html

title: Orthanc API Client — Orthanc
text: Request body JSON schema (application/json): Asynchronous (logical): TRUE, run job asynchronous mode, means REST API call immediately return, reporting identifier job. Prefer flavor wherever possible. Level (character): Level query (Patient, Study, Series Instance) LocalAet (character): Local AET used commands, defaults DicomAet configuration option. Ignored DicomModalities already sets LocalAet modality. Permissive (logical): TRUE, ignore errors individual steps job. Default value FALSE. Priority (numeric): asynchronous mode, priority job. higher value, higher priority. Default value 0 Resources (list): List queries identifying DICOM resources sent. Usage wildcards prohibited query shall contain DICOM ID tags. Additionally, may provide SOPClassesInStudy limit scope DICOM negotiation certain SOPClassUID present uncommon SOPClassUID DICOM negotiation. default, Orhanc propose 120 common SOPClassUIDs. Synchronous (logical): TRUE, run job synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain result job. default, easy behavior, desirable long jobs, might lead network timeouts. Timeout (numeric): Timeout C-GET command, seconds UserData (list): User data travel along job.

text: Request body JSON schema (application/json): Asynchronous (logical): TRUE, run job asynchronous mode, means REST API call immediately return, reporting identifier job. Prefer flavor wherever possible. CalledAet (character): Called AET used commands, defaults AET configuration option. Allows overwrite destination AET specific operation. Host (character): Host used commands, defaults Host configuration option. Allows overwrite destination host specific operation. LocalAet (character): Local AET used commands, defaults DicomAet configuration option. Ignored DicomModalities already sets LocalAet modality. MoveOriginatorAet (character): Move originator AET used commands, order fake C-MOVE SCU MoveOriginatorID (numeric): Move originator ID used commands, order fake C-MOVE SCU Permissive (logical): TRUE, ignore errors individual steps job. Default value FALSE. Port (numeric): Port used command, defaults Port configuration option. Allows overwrite destination port specific operation. Priority (numeric): asynchronous mode, priority job. higher value, higher priority. Default value 0 Resources (list): List Orthanc identifiers DICOM resources sent StorageCommitment (logical): Whether chain C-STORE DICOM storage commitment validate success transmission: https://orthanc.uclouvain./book/users/storage-commitment.html#chaining-c-store--storage-commitment Synchronous (logical): TRUE, run job synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain result job. default, easy behavior, desirable long jobs, might lead network timeouts. Timeout (numeric): Timeout C-STORE command, seconds UserData (list): User data travel along job. Request body: Orthanc identifier one resource sent (text/plain).

Default value 0 PrivateCreator (character): private creator used private tags Replace Remove (list): List additional tags removed DICOM instances. Synchronous (logical): TRUE, run job synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain result job. default, easy behavior, desirable long jobs, might lead network timeouts. KeepLabels (logical): Keep labels resources level (defaults FALSE) KeepPrivateTags (logical): Keep private tags DICOM instances (defaults FALSE) KeepSource (logical): set FALSE, instructs Orthanc remove original resources. default, original resources kept Orthanc. LossyQuality (numeric): transcoding lossy transfer syntax, entry defines quality integer 1 100. provided, value defined "DicomLossyTranscodingQuality" configuration. (new v1.12.7) Permissive (logical): TRUE, ignore errors individual steps job. Default value FALSE. Priority (numeric): asynchronous mode, priority job. higher value, higher priority. Default value 0 PrivateCreator (character): private creator used private tags Replace Remove (list): List additional tags removed DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). Replace (list): Associative array change value DICOM tags DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). Synchronous (logical): TRUE, run job synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain result job. default, easy behavior, desirable long jobs, might lead network timeouts. text: Request body JSON schema (application/json): Asynchronous (logical): TRUE, create archive asynchronous mode, means job submitted create archive background. Extended (logical): TRUE, include additional tags SeriesDescription, leading -called extended DICOMDIR. Default value FALSE. Filename (character): Filename set "Content-Disposition" HTTP header (including file extension) LossyQuality (numeric): transcoding lossy transfer syntax, entry defines quality integer 1 100. provided, value defined "DicomLossyTranscodingQuality" configuration. (new v1.12.7) Priority (numeric): asynchronous mode, priority job. higher value, higher priority. Synchronous (logical): TRUE, create archive synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain ZIP file. default, easy behavior. However, global configuration option "SynchronousZipStream" set "false", asynchronous transfers preferred large amount data, creation temporary file might lead network timeouts. Transcode (character): present, DICOM files archive transcoded provided transfer syntax: https://orthanc.uclouvain./book/faq/transcoding.html UserData (list): asynchronous mode, user data attached job.

title: Orthanc API Client — Orthanc
text: id (character) Orthanc identifier series interest. json (list) Named-list request body. See Details.

title: Orthanc API Client — Orthanc
text: Request body JSON schema (application/json): Asynchronous (logical): TRUE, run job asynchronous mode, means REST API call immediately return, reporting identifier job. Prefer flavor wherever possible. Force (logical): Allow modification tags related DICOM identifiers, risk breaking DICOM model real world Keep (list): Keep original value specified tags, chosen among StudyInstanceUID, SeriesInstanceUID SOPInstanceUID tags. Avoid feature much possible, breaks DICOM model real world. KeepSource (logical): set FALSE, instructs Orthanc remove original resources. default, original resources kept Orthanc. LossyQuality (numeric): transcoding lossy transfer syntax, entry defines quality integer 1 100. provided, value defined "DicomLossyTranscodingQuality" configuration. (new v1.12.7) Permissive (logical): TRUE, ignore errors individual steps job. Default value FALSE. Priority (numeric): asynchronous mode, priority job. higher value, higher priority. Default value 0 PrivateCreator (character): private creator used private tags Replace Remove (list): List tags must removed DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). RemovePrivateTags (logical): Remove private tags DICOM instances (defaults FALSE) Replace (list): Associative array change value DICOM tags DICOM instances. Starting Orthanc 1.9.4, paths subsequences can provided using syntax dcmodify command-line tool (wildcards supported well). Synchronous (logical): TRUE, run job synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain result job. default, easy behavior, desirable long jobs, might lead network timeouts. Transcode (character): Transcode DICOM instances provided DICOM transfer syntax: https://orthanc.uclouvain./book/faq/transcoding.html UserData (list): User data travel along job.

text: Request body JSON schema (application/json): Asynchronous (logical): TRUE, create archive asynchronous mode, means job submitted create archive background. Extended (logical): TRUE, include additional tags SeriesDescription, leading -called extended DICOMDIR. Default value FALSE. Filename (character): Filename set "Content-Disposition" HTTP header (including file extension) LossyQuality (numeric): transcoding lossy transfer syntax, entry defines quality integer 1 100. provided, value defined "DicomLossyTranscodingQuality" configuration. (new v1.12.7) Priority (numeric): asynchronous mode, priority job. higher value, higher priority. Resources (list): list Orthanc identifiers interest. Synchronous (logical): TRUE, create archive synchronous mode, means HTTP answer directly contain ZIP file. default, easy behavior. However, global configuration option "SynchronousZipStream" set "false", asynchronous transfers preferred large amount data, creation temporary file might lead network timeouts. Transcode (character): present, DICOM files archive transcoded provided transfer syntax: https://orthanc.uclouvain./book/faq/transcoding.html UserData (list): asynchronous mode, user data attached job.

title: Orthanc API Client — Orthanc
text: Request body JSON schema (application/json): CaseSensitive (logical): Enable case-sensitive search PN value representations (defaults configuration option CaseSensitivePN) Expand (logical): set "true", retrieve detailed information individual resources, Orthanc identifiers Full (logical): set TRUE, report DICOM tags full format (tags indexed hexadecimal format, associated symbolic name value) Labels (list): List strings specifying labels look resources (new Orthanc 1.12.0) LabelsConstraint (character): Constraint labels, can , , None (defaults , new Orthanc 1.12.0) Level (character): Level query (Patient, Study, Series Instance) Limit (numeric): Limit number reported resources MetadataQuery (list): Associative array containing filter values metadata (new Orthanc 1.12.5) OrderBy (list): Array associative arrays containing requested ordering (new Orthanc 1.12.5) ParentPatient (character): Limit reported resources descendants patient (new Orthanc 1.12.5) ParentSeries (character): Limit reported resources descendants series (new Orthanc 1.12.5) ParentStudy (character): Limit reported resources descendants study (new Orthanc 1.12.5) Query (list): Associative array containing filter values DICOM tags RequestedTags (list): list DICOM tags include response (applicable "Expand" set true). tags requested tags returned 'RequestedTags' field response. Note , requesting tags listed Main Dicom Tags stored DB, building response might slow since Orthanc need access DICOM files. specified, Orthanc return Main Dicom Tags keep backward compatibility Orthanc prior 1.11.0. ResponseContent (list): Defines content response returned resource. (field, present, overrides "Expand" field). Allowed values MainDicomTags, Metadata, Children, Parent, Labels, Status, IsStable, IsProtected, Attachments. specified, Orthanc return MainDicomTags, Metadata, Children, Parent, Labels, Status, IsStable, IsProtected.(new Orthanc 1.12.5) Short (logical): set TRUE, report DICOM tags hexadecimal format Since (numeric): Show resources since provided index (conjunction Limit)
